sentences.en: "Who is it?" he called.— 'It's your neighbor.'
sentences.cn: “是谁啊？”他问道。——“是你的邻居。”

sentences.en: And he said unto him, "Who is my neighbor?"
sentences.cn: 他于是对他说道：“谁是我邻居？”

sentences.en: He matched his dog against his neighbor's in a race.
sentences.cn: 他让他的狗和邻居的狗赛跑.

sentences.en: Help your neighbor, but do not make him dependent.
sentences.cn: 协助你的邻居，但是不要让他产生依赖。

sentences.en: I hear that our married neighbor has escaped to her lover.
sentences.cn: 我听说我们那位已婚的邻居逃到她情夫那儿去了.

sentences.en: I heard about it at first hand from my neighbor.
sentences.cn: 我是直接从我的邻居那里听来的.

sentences.en: I parked my baby at the neighbor's house.
sentences.cn: 我把小孩寄放在邻居家里。

sentences.en: I want to put up a fence between our property and our neighbor's.
sentences.cn: 我要在我们和邻居的地产之间修道篱笆.

sentences.en: It means you love Him with all your heart, and you love your neighbor as yourself.
sentences.cn: 它意味着你全心全意的爱上帝并且像爱自己那样爱邻居。

sentences.en: Just when I needed the ladder, I found that you had lent it to our neighbor.
sentences.cn: 我正需要用梯子的时候, 发现你已经借给了邻居.

sentences.en: My neighbor?
sentences.cn: 我的邻居？

sentences.en: My new neighbor moved in last weekend and already we're on speaking terms.
sentences.cn: 我的新邻居上周才搬来,可是我们已经认识.

sentences.en: Nor is Bob anywise a good neighbor.
sentences.cn: 无论从那个方面讲鲍勃也决不是个好邻居.

sentences.en: One of the neighbors complained about the noise from the party.
sentences.cn: 有位邻居抱怨聚会太吵

sentences.en: See, if you break any one of those commandments, you do not love your neighbor as yourself.
sentences.cn: 看，如果你违反了其中任何一条戒律，你就没能像爱自己那样爱邻居。

sentences.en: She boarded out her children with a neighbor.
sentences.cn: 她把孩子们寄在邻居家膳宿.

sentences.en: So I decide to find my neighbor to solve this problem.
sentences.cn: 所以我决定去找我的邻居来解决这个问题。

sentences.en: The villagers sentenced one man to five lashes for stealing a ham from his neighbor.
sentences.cn: 村民们裁定将一名偷邻居火腿的男子鞭打5下。

sentences.en: The woman begged her neighbor for help.
sentences.cn: 那名妇女请求邻居帮忙.

sentences.en: The woman denounced her neighbor for helping the enemy.
sentences.cn: 这位妇女告发她的邻居帮助敌人.

sentences.en: We were just having a peaceful conversation when my neighbor pushed in without being asked.
sentences.cn: 我们正安静地谈话时,我们的邻居硬插进来打断了我们的谈话.

sentences.en: Your new neighbor is known to the police, so you'd better lock your door.
sentences.cn: 你那位新邻居在警察局登记有案, 你最好把门锁上.

words.tran_cn: 睦邻的；友好的；邻居似的
像邻居的；亲切的；睦邻的
邻近；周围；邻居关系；附近一带
与…为邻；位于附近（neighbor的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: someone who lives next to you or near you
